Proverbs__26.2__As a bird: : The meaning is, that a curse uttered without cause shall do no harm to the person that is cursed, but will return upon him that curseth, as whithersoever a bird flies, it returns to its own nest.
Proverbs__26.4__Answer not a fool: : Viz., so as to imitate him but only so as to reprove his folly.
